property.name: hasCustomSettings
property.shortdesc: Determines if this animated object has custom settings.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the AnimationSetting &#40;a PageItem, HtmlItem, FormField, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject, Button, MediaItem, Sound, Movie, EPSText, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Graphic, ImportedPage, PICT, WMF, PDF, EPS, Image, Group or TextFrame).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: preset
property.shortdesc: The base animation preset applied. Can return: MotionPreset, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: transformOffsets
property.shortdesc: The tranform offset percentage from the target object bounding box's left-top corner.

property.name: duration
property.shortdesc: The duration in second for this animation.

property.name: motionPathPoints
property.shortdesc: The list of motion path points for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing pathPointArray:Array of Ordered array containing anchor:Array of 2 Reals, leftDirection:Array of 2 Reals, rightDirection:Array of 2 Reals, pathOpen:Boolean.

property.name: motionPath
property.shortdesc: The list of motion path points and key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, pathPoint:Ordered array containing anchor:Array of 2 Reals, leftDirection:Array of 2 Reals, rightDirection:Array of 2 Reals.

property.name: opacityArray
property.shortdesc: The list of opacity key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.

property.name: rotationArray
property.shortdesc: The list of rotation key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.

property.name: scaleXArray
property.shortdesc: The list of scale x key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.

property.name: scaleYArray
property.shortdesc: The list of scale y key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.

property.name: designOption
property.shortdesc: The animation design option.

property.name: easeType
property.shortdesc: The ease type.

property.name: plays
property.shortdesc: The number of times this animation plays.

property.name: playsLoop
property.shortdesc: Set to true if animation play loops.

property.name: initiallyHidden
property.shortdesc: Determines if this object is initially hidden when displayed in an exported SWF file.

property.name: hiddenAfter
property.shortdesc: Determines if this object is hidden after its animation is played in an exported SWF file.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: saveACopy
method.shortdesc: Save a copy of this motion preset to a InDesign motion preset file.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Flash motion preset file to export to.

method.name: save
method.shortdesc: Save this motion preset as custom preset.

parameter.name: name
parameter.shortdesc: The name for the new motion preset.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the AnimationSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
